    • Uses of ReplayRenderer in org.archive.wayback

      Methods in org.archive.wayback that return ReplayRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplayRenderer ReplayDispatcher.getRenderer(WaybackRequest wbRequest, CaptureSearchResult result, Resource resource)
      Return a ReplayRenderer appropriate for the Resource.
      ReplayRenderer ReplayDispatcher.getRenderer(WaybackRequest wbRequest, CaptureSearchResult result, Resource httpHeadersResource, Resource payloadResource)
      Return a ReplayRenderer appropriate for the replaying the http headers from httpHeadersResource and the payload from payloadResource.

    • Uses of ReplayRenderer in org.archive.wayback.archivalurl

      Classes in org.archive.wayback.archivalurl that implement ReplayRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArchivalUrlASXReplayRenderer 
      class  ArchivalUrlCSSReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer which attempts to rewrite URLs found within a text/css document to load from this context.
      class  ArchivalUrlDateRedirectReplayRenderer 
      class  ArchivalUrlJSReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer which attempts to rewrite absolute URLs within a text/javascript document to make them load correctly from an ArchivalURL AccessPoint.
      class  ArchivalURLJSStringTransformerReplayRenderer 
      class  ArchivalUrlSAXRewriteReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer which attempts to rewrite text/html documents so URLs references within the document load from the correct ArchivalURL AccessPoint.
      class  ClientSideHTMLReplayRenderer
      Classic ReplayRenderer which uses a combination of server-side modification and embedded javascript to rewrite URLs within an HTML page to make embedded URLs point back to a specific ArchivalURL AccessPoint.
      class  ServerSideHTMLReplayRenderer
      ArchivalUrl ReplayRenderer which uses a series of RegEx's to rewrite embedded URLs to point back into a specific ArchivalUrl AccessPoint.
      Methods in org.archive.wayback.archivalurl that return ReplayRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ReplayRenderer ArchivalUrlSAXRewriteReplayRenderer.getFrameWrappingRenderer()

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      class  JSPReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer implementation which just forwards responsibility for rendering a resource to a .jsp file.
      class  ReplayRendererDecorator 
      class  TextReplayRenderer 
      class  TransparentReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer implementation which returns the archive document as pristinely as possible -- no modifications to response code, HTTP headers, or original byte-stream.

      Classes in org.archive.wayback.replay.swf that implement ReplayRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SWFReplayRenderer
      ReplayRenderer which passes embedded URLs inside flash (SWF) format content through a ResultURIConverter, allowing them to be rewritten.
